remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不包含任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not include any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼示範如何使用委派與事件。This code demonstrates using the delegate with the event. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱。For the complete code example, see .
